summary: This module implements a component that prepares and executes a node‑prediction apply pipeline. It loads and merges configuration settings, utilizes factory helpers for data, model, and pipeline creation, renders a runnable script from a Jinja2 template, and writes the resulting files. The component is designed for command‑line use via Typer, streamlining the deployment of a pre‑trained node prediction model on new graph data.
business_intent: Provide an automated, user‑friendly way to apply a trained node‑prediction model to fresh graph datasets by generating the necessary execution script and handling all configuration details.
